verbs.description: [ARG0: Rep. Mark Meadows ( R - N.C. )] [V: says] [ARG1: he will request an investigation into how special counsel Robert Mueller is spending his budget in his investigation into Russian election interference and alleged collusion . Here 's why he wants Mueller investigated Meadows said that he would ask the Government Accountability Office to audit the finances of the investigation . " There will be a request from us to audit the financial resources of this investigation] , " Meadows explained . " It is certainly within the parameters . It is appropriated funding from Congress . " Meadows sits on the House Oversight and Government Reform Committee , and has been an outspoken supporter of Trump 's policies . Mueller has reportedly spent $ 7 million in his investigation , which has netted 23 indictments . He is already required to produce a public expense report every six months . Meadows has threatened to hold Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein in contempt , and even said he would support impeachment if Rosenstein did n't cooperate with congressional subpoenas . ' Witch hunt ! ' Many other …

Rep. Mark Meadows ( R - N.C. ) says he [V: will] request an investigation into how special counsel Robert Mueller is spending his budget in his investigation into Russian election interference and alleged collusion . Here 's why he wants Mueller investigated Meadows said that he would ask the Government Accountability Office to audit the finances of the investigation . " There will be a request from us to audit the financial resources of this investigation , " Meadows explained . " It is certainly within the parameters . It is appropriated funding from Congress . " Meadows sits on the House Oversight and Government Reform Committee , and has been an outspoken supporter of Trump 's policies . Mueller has reportedly spent $ 7 million in his investigation , which has netted 23 indictments . He is already required to produce a public expense report every six months . Meadows has threatened to hold Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein in contempt , and even said he would support impeachment if Rosenstein did n't cooperate with congressional subpoenas . ' Witch hunt ! ' Many other …

Rep. Mark Meadows ( R - N.C. ) says he will request an investigation into how special counsel Robert Mueller is spending his budget in his investigation into Russian election interference and alleged collusion . Here 's why he wants Mueller investigated Meadows said that he would ask the Government Accountability Office to audit the finances of the investigation . " There will be a request from us to audit the financial resources of this investigation , " Meadows explained . " It is certainly within the parameters . It is appropriated funding from Congress . " Meadows sits on the House Oversight and Government Reform Committee , and has been an outspoken supporter of Trump 's policies . Mueller has reportedly spent $ 7 million in his investigation , which has netted 23 indictments . He is already required to produce a public expense report every six months . Meadows has threatened to hold Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein in contempt , and even said he [V: would] support impeachment if Rosenstein did n't cooperate with congressional subpoenas . ' Witch hunt ! ' Many other …
